title: rather than nemisis draft....
body: could we ummm have regular draft instead? i don't want to sound like an ass or anything but i got all exited only to be like ohh.... well that's um yea not my thing.

replies.body: Thought was gonna be another urf thread. Was surprised.
You don't have to play it, no one is forcing you to play it, just let others have a bit of fun with it.
